item.title: YaGo, converting Yara rules into JSON files
item.author: yararules@gmail.com (YaraRules)
item.description: NOTE Yago project is archived and no longer maintained. Yara-Rules project is proud to anounce YaGo. YaGo is a tool that converts Yara rules into JSON files, that’s it, simple. Yara has a great comunity that use it and use a lot of rules, but sometimes it is hard to manage all of them, it is difficult to get a bird’s eye view of your rule set so we thought coverting the rules in json format will help.
